description: The Schabarum trail is in the Peter F. Schabarum Regional Park which is very cool because it the huge park is in a "middle" of a crowded city.It is moderately challenge; my 8 years old boy and do it easily without any complaint.  The park entrance cost $6 for parking and you can hike from there; or you can find a parking on the street and park for free.
directions: The park address is 17250 Colima Rd, Rowland Heights, CA 91748.  Use google map and it will get you there correctly.  Or you can follow the following direction.When travel on freeway CA-60 take exit S. Azusa Ave and turn left on Colima Rd.  The park entrance is on the right.
title: Schabarum Trail
